mapper.select: SELECT SIS.ID_SHADOW_INV, SIS.VER_SHADOW_INV, SIS.CODE_TYPE_STATE, (SIS.NUMBER_SEQUENTIAL+1) NUMBER_SEQUENTIAL, SIS.CODE_INVOICE_STATE, SIS.CODE_STATUS, SYSDATE DATE_INSERT, SYSDATE DATE_MOD, 'BATCHH' CODE_USER, 'FENIX JOB' PROCESS FROM INGEN_SET_MARKET.SHADOW_INV_STATE SIS WHERE SIS.ID_SHADOW_INV = (SELECT ID_SHADOW_INV FROM V_SETTLEMENT WHERE ID_CONTRACT = #{statusBean.contractID} AND ID_PRESCRIPTION = 1000 AND DATE_INV = TO_DATE(#{statusBean.fechaChange}, 'DD/MM/YY')) ORDER BY SIS.VER_SHADOW_INV DESC, SIS.NUMBER_SEQUENTIAL DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
